blogPost.title: First Day at Shop
blogPost.content: 29/7/16, This date is more memorable then my own birthday because this was the time when I had my first day at job and also it was the first I saw her.Her interaction with me only last for 15 min, But it felt that it is enough till eternity.

blogPost.title: Second Date with Her
blogPost.content: 29/9/16, Just two month after of meeting her, I am having date with her, This thing between us was so unreal that I didn't got Idea that first day of meeting wasn't the only the special day for me.
